clientSide.title: Client-Side Encryption
clientSide.description: All data is encrypted BEFORE being sent to the server.

passwordManager.description: Store all your passwords securely in one place.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform
crossPlatform.description: Works on all devices - desktop, tablet, and mobile.

openSource.title: Transparent & Open Source
